channel.title: Datafusion Connections (Optional) on NGENUITY™ 3D Visualization System User Guide
channel.description: Recent content in Datafusion Connections (Optional) on NGENUITY™ 3D Visualization System User Guide

item.title: Constellation™ Connection
item.description: WARNING Only the Constellation™ Vision System should be connected to an Ethernet port on the embedded processing unit (EPU) during normal system operation. The other Ethernet ports are for maintenance purposes only. Connect the Ethernet cable from the system to the Constellation™ Ethernet connector and setup DataFusion settings on the system.

item.title: Centurion™ Connection
item.description: Enable wireless communication on the Centurion™ and setup DataFusion settings on the system

item.title: ORA SYSTEM™ Connection
item.description: Connect the provided HDMI cable to the HDMI output connector on the ORA SYSTEM™.
